description:
==========================================================================

LEARN HOW TO CREATE BEAUTIFUL VIDEO INFOGRAPHICS USING POWERPOINT

==========================================================================

DID YOU KNOW?

You can create amazing videos using Microsoft PowerPoint and not just boring slideshows! If you have creativity by your side, you can use PowerPoint as an effective animation tool to create video infographics!

These kind of videos are in great demand, and you can monetize them by selling your services as a freelancer on sites such as Fiverr, PeoplePerHour, Upwork and Freelancer!

*******************************************************************************************************
NO EXPENSIVE SOFTWARE

NO PRIOR EXPERIENCE NEEDED
*******************************************************************************************************

In this course, I’ll provide a step-by-step process, to create amazing animated infographics using free icons, shapes and text in PowerPoint. Right from choosing color themes & icons, and adding various animation & transition effects, to adding narration & exporting videos in high definition. I’ll cover it all!

This is a complete ‘hands-on’ course with various exercises, and I promise you it’s going to be a lot of fun!

So, let’s dive in right away. I’ll see you on the other side!

NOTE: All the online tools/resources discussed in this course are closely related to the course material and are necessary to enhance your learning. Some of these tools may require a free sign-up, to access them. We do not have any affiliation with the sites discussed here.
title: Animated Infographics In 30 Minutes: Using PowerPoint
